Num.FuncTxt: return TryGetProp(skill, "MaxRValue", 300);

local overBuff = "SHADOW_RAID_BOSS_FRENZY_BUFF" local ratio = 0; if IsBuffApplied(self, overBuff) == "YES" then local over = GetBuffOver(self, overBuff); if over ~= nil and over > 3 then if over >= 10 then over = 10 end ratio = ratio + (over * 0.08); end end return ratio;
